plot: Ed places a fake bounty for her own father, in hopes Jet and Spike will lead her to him. They do, and despite a joyous reunion, her father immediately abandons her to pursue his work.

Faye decides to investigate her past by using the visible landmarks depicted in the video she recorded as a child, while Ed guides Jet and Spike to search for her true father, who she recently discovers. [major spoiler]Ed leaves the Bebop with Ein.[/major spoiler]—Anonymous
